components.description: Clear safety goggles. When this emoji was approved in 2018 it was implied to be safety goggles rather than swimming goggles. A year later ðŸ¤¿ Diving Mask, which is similar in design but used to represent swimming goggles rather than safety goggles, was approved.
components.title: Goggles

title: Goggles

version.description:
Unicode 11.0 was released on June 5, 2018. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page but for the full 2018 emoji list see Emoji 11.0.

Emoji 11.0 includes every new emoji, including variations for skin tone, gender and new emojis that don't require additional code points, such as the chess pawn or pirate flag which are not shown on this page.

apple_vendor_description: The goggles emoji on Apple devices are depicted with a clean, modern aesthetic, featuring clear, slightly reflective lenses that catch the light with Apple's characteristic glossy finish. Their smooth, rounded frames suggest a comfortable and secure fit, hinting at adventure and preparedness. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, evokes a sense of protection, exploration, and readiness for exciting activities, whether it's diving into the ocean or tackling a new project.
